name: Manectric
description: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flash Impact
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
